pua_characters.description: Private Use Area characters (U+E000-U+F8FF) from PDF custom fonts

broken_english_words.description: Spaces inserted inside English words (e.g., 'off icer' -> 'officer')

missing_spaces_english.description: Missing spaces between concatenated English words (e.g., 'ofthe' -> 'of the')

header_footer_residue.description: Page header/footer text leaked into question content (代號, 頁次, 請接背面, etc.)

five_digit_code_pollution.description: Five-digit exam codes (e.g., 50120) stuck in question content

multiple_consecutive_spaces.description: Three or more consecutive spaces in text

empty_or_short_stems.description: Choice questions with stem shorter than 5 characters

options_in_stem.description: Stems containing (A)(B)(C)(D) text while options dict is empty or duplicated

truncated_text.description: Text appearing to end mid-sentence or mid-word

cid_references.description: (cid:NNNN) patterns from PDF font extraction failures
